repairedDockerfile:
from debian 
run apt-get update && \
 apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y maven openjdk-7-jdk && \
apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
add pom.xml /srv/jersey-skeleton/ 
workdir /srv/jersey-skeleton/ 
run mvn install 
add src /srv/jersey-skeleton/src/ 
expose 8080 
cmd mvn jetty:run
